slide-1.title: How to Play
content: Baccarat is a game where you bet on which hand will win: Player, Banker, or a Tie, with the goal of having a total value closest to 9.

slide-2.title: How to Play
content: Cards have values based on their numbers, with face cards (J, Q, K) worth 0 and Ace worth 1. If the total card value exceeds 9, only the last digit is counted (for example, 15 becomes 5).

slide-3.title: Winning
content: The winner is the hand with a total score closest to 9. If the total points are the same for Player and Banker, the result is a Tie.
